snippet.title: Kings Gambit Trailer- I'm building a chess game
snippet.description:
Steam Page- https://store.steampowered.com/app/3077910/Kings_Gambit/

Kings Gambit Discord
https://discord.gg/f6BANqWW8j



King's Gambit is a Cooperative Dungeon Crawler Roguelite inspired by Chess! Battle your way through several guilds, each with unique characters, chess pieces, obstacles, hazards and challenging boss battles. Conquer each guild to unlock new playable characters, each wielding unique weapons and spells. Experience it all solo or with a friend in co-op mode!
